name: gitlab-mcp-server
description: GitLab MCP Server with comprehensive search capabilities and GraphQL discovery - perfect for LLM exploration
author: ttpears <noreply@github.com>

gitlab.description: GitLab MCP Server with comprehensive search and GraphQL discovery capabilities

GITLAB_AUTH_MODE.description: Authentication mode: shared, per-user, or hybrid (default: hybrid)

GITLAB_SHARED_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Optional shared GitLab access token for read-only operations (read_api scope)

GITLAB_MAX_PAGE_SIZE.description: Maximum page size for paginated queries (1-100)

tools.name: search_gitlab
tools.description: Global search across GitLab (projects, issues, merge requests) - ideal for LLM exploration

tools.name: search_projects
tools.description: Search for GitLab projects by name or description

tools.name: search_issues
tools.description: Search for issues globally or within specific projects with state filtering

tools.name: search_merge_requests
tools.description: Search for merge requests and code changes with advanced filters

tools.name: search_users
tools.description: Search for GitLab users by username or name

tools.name: search_groups
tools.description: Search for GitLab groups and organizations

tools.name: browse_repository
tools.description: Browse repository files and folder structure for code exploration

tools.name: get_file_content
tools.description: Get the content of specific files from GitLab repositories for analysis

tools.name: get_current_user
tools.description: Get information about the current authenticated GitLab user

tools.name: get_projects
tools.description: List projects accessible to the current user with pagination support

tools.name: get_project
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific GitLab project by full path

tools.name: get_issues
tools.description: Get issues from a specific GitLab project with pagination support

tools.name: get_merge_requests
tools.description: Get merge requests from a specific GitLab project with pagination support

tools.name: create_issue
tools.description: Create a new issue in a GitLab project (requires user authentication)

tools.name: create_merge_request
tools.description: Create a new merge request in a GitLab project (requires user authentication)

tools.name: execute_custom_query
tools.description: Execute custom GraphQL queries against the GitLab API

tools.name: get_available_queries
tools.description: Get list of available GraphQL queries and mutations from schema introspection
